## Introduction

- According to the latest WHO data published in 2020 Coronary Heart Disease Deaths in Malaysia reached 36,729 or 21.86% of total deaths. 
- The age adjusted Death Rate is 136.21 per 100,000 of population ranks Malaysia #61 in the world.
